ModMetaData.name: Absolute Legends Guns CE Patch
ModMetaData.author: RE6AL
ModMetaData.description:
Makes Abso-Lutely legendary pistols CE compatible as they were intended from the start.
Originally the mod was intended for CE only, but later i decided to split it into Mod+Patch for vanilla people. I personally couldnt stand vanilla after i found CE, but someone can disagree with this
